text: (nabiyē!) obagē deviyan malāyikāvarunṭa “mā bhūmiyehi (magē) niyōjitayā (ādam)va nirmāṇaya kirīmaṭa yannemi” yayi pævasū avasthāvēdī, (eyaṭa) ovun “(bhumiyehi) napurukam karamin lē vaguravannaṭa (paramparāvak bihi kirīmaṭa) yana ohuva, ehi (obagē niyōjitayā vaśayen) pat karannehida? api nam, obagē pariśuddhabhāvaya pavasamin, obagē praśaṁsāva magin obava suviśuddha karaminma siṭinnemu” yayi pævasūha. (eyaṭa deviyan vahansē) “oba nodænuvat dæya siyalla niyata vaśayenma mā hon̆din dæna siṭinnemi” yayi pævasuvēya
